title: Construction Site Safety Training: VR-Based Practical Drills

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental construction processes and safety regulations
context.additional_context: High-risk construction work simulation training for office/administrative professionals, utilizing personal VR devices in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Identify construction site hazards (falls, entrapment, equipment accidents, etc.) with over 80% accuracy through VR simulation.
Apply standard safety procedures (safety harness use, permit-to-work systems, etc.) with 95% accuracy in VR environments.
Evaluate collaboration and communication skills in team-based crisis response scenarios (achieving 4 or higher on a 5-point scale).

resources: Motivation assessment tool using IMI surveys

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
